Tata T.7 Ultra Overview

Market leader Tata Motors provides the sleek and sophisticated T.7 Ultra trucks if you’re seeking for a premium light-duty vehicle in the 7-8T GVW category. The new Ultra cabin, as the name suggests, provides the finest comfort, convenience, and safety in the segment. This tiny and stylish vehicle is ideal for city logistics applications, since it is very easy to drive and manoeuvre even during heavy traffic. The Tata Ultra cabin is known for its appealing and premium design elements, as well as its walk-through features. There is enough space inside to comfortably accommodate a driver and two co-passengers.

Tata T.7 Ultra Engine Capacity

The T.7 Ultra gets a suitable and powerful powertrain composed of a 4SPCR, 2956cc, BS6 engine that produces 98hp of power and 300 Nm of torque, tuned to a Tata’s G400, 5-speed manual synchromesh gearbox which has the 5-forward and 1-reverse gear.

Tata T.7 Ultra Price in India

T.7 Ultra is your next LCV truck for all cargo delivery needs, with prices ranging from 15.22 to 16.78 lakh ex-showroom.

Other features Tata T.7 Ultra

The T.7 Ultra comes with greater safety features, a comfortable in-cabin experience, and the world-class advanced 1.9-meter Ultra cabin, an aerodynamically designed and most secure cabin for each of driving. The T.7 Ultra is the only truck that has the walkthrough cabin, roomy interiors, and seats driver only. Undoubtedly, one of the promising trucks in the segment can be used for multiple cargo requirements in today’s competitive logistics sector
